original_text: For this is as the waters of Noah unto me: for as I have sworn that the waters of Noah should no more go over the earth; so have I sworn that I would not be wroth with thee, nor rebuke thee.
korean_text: 이는 내게 노아의 홍수와 같도다 내가 다시는 노아의 홍수로 땅 위에 범람하지 못하게 하리라 맹세한 것 같이 내가 네게 노하지 아니하며 너를 책망하지 아니하기로 맹세하였노니

sentences.original_text: For this is as the waters of Noah unto me:
that the waters of Noah should no more go over the earth;
sentences.korean_translation: 노아의 물이 다시는 땅을 넘치지 않을 것이라

sentences.original_text: that I would not be wroth with thee,
